bill.title: JUSTICE Act Just and Unifying Solutions To Invigorate Communities Everywhere Act of 2020
bill.description: To improve and reform policing practices, accountability and transparency.

history.action: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on House Administration, and the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
